prompt: A bustling academic conference scene featuring researchers from various fields exchanging ideas and presenting their findings, with Gachon University banners and an audience engaged in discussion.

A dynamic image depicting a team of university staff collaborating on new student programs, surrounded by diverse students engaging in various educational activities, highlighting a focus on skill development and support initiatives.
